@DinisCruz @Netlify I'm afraid not. But that said, any developer who is comfortable working with common web technologies and processes is likely to do well. Git, APIs, F/E mainstays and tools like Gulp or Webpack. One of Netlify's strength, I think, is that it is not exotic. Git and #JAMstack FTW!
